item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: September 28, 2025 Today's Verse 2 Corinthians 5:17 [17] Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come. This Year's Memory Verses Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable.
